viability_margin_oracle.description: Parameters governing VMO's dynamic computation of the epsilon safety margin.

constraint_budget_matrix.description: Static resource allocation constraints enforced by CBM (L2).

metric_efficacy_contract.description: Constants used by MEC to weight and synthesize L5 metrics.

interface_mandate: The CMO ensures that all runtime constants derived from the Config Hash are traceable, immutable for the active manifest version, and accessible for L2 and L6 validation.
